Does any one have a solution when it comes to implementing the HubSpot chat on a button click rather than a page load?

(this is not for a HubSpot landing page and is for our internal react app)

Hi <@U07RRAFDNJK>

Looks like this should be easy. Here is what I will do:

*First*, configure the chat settings in HubSpot to not show the chat automatically (via HubSpot settings). I hope it is available there. If not, you can prevent the widget from showing up initially by using JavaScript to control when the chat script initializes.

Once the HubSpot chat widget is set to not show automatically, make sure the chat script is fully loaded before triggering the widget.

*Second*, create a button in your app that users can click to open the chat widget. Instead of loading the chat automatically, you'll use HubSpot's JavaScript API to open the chat manually when the button is clicked.

Hopefully this works for you. Thanks!
